businessProfile.name: Il Capo Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 7366 E Shea Blvd, Scottsdale, AZ 85260, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 7366 E Shea Blvd, Scottsdale, AZ 85260, USA

reviews.text: Excellent little pizza place. Really cool authentic vibe inside. Prices are very reasonable and servings are substantial. The food was all excellent. Pizza was cooked perfect and very flavorful. Calzone was huge, soft, and delicious. The Arancini was so good and like nothing I‚Äôve had. The wine was fantastic and half off on Wednesday for the bottle. Our waiter Deangelo was the only server and bartender for the whole place and he did great. He was attentive, friendly, and very informative. I can‚Äôt wait to eat here again and try some of the other things on the menu.

Absolutely no complaints across the table!! Everything was incredible and so much bang for your buck! Diangelo the waiter/bartender/host was an absolute rockstar and was a lot of fun and a joy to meet. The food was fantastic and banger portions! I got the Calzone with Mixed Greens Salad (I managed 1/4 of the Calzone and am thrilled to have left overs!), my 13y/o got the Cauliflower Crust Pizza with Bacon/Pepperoni/Chicken (as a GF teen he has a hard time finding good food sometimes but he loved this pizza and was thrilled he had choices!). My husband got the Fig and Prosciutto Pizza ("it was great, fantastic, amazing"), and my 10y/o got the kids Spaghetti with Meatball (ate the whole thing and wanted seconds!) Would absolutely go back!

5-Star Review: A Slice of Italy at Il Capo Pizzeria!

I'm thrilled to share my exceptional experience at Il Cappo, our go-to spot for delicious Italian cuisine!

Standout Features:

1. Cozy and Inviting Atmosphere: Il Cappo's comfortable and intimate setting makes it the perfect spot for a relaxing dinner or a quick gelato treat.

2. Exceptional Service: The staff at Il Cappo are warm, friendly, and attentive, always ensuring that our dining experience is top-notch.

3. Authentic Italian Flavors: Il Cappo's pizza and gelato are simply delicious.

Personal Experience:

We're regulars at Il Cappo, and for good reason! Whether we're in the mood for a delicious pizza or just a sweet gelato treat, Il Cappo never disappoints. The staff knows us by name, and we love the warm, welcoming atmosphere they create.

Verdict:

Il Cappo is a must-visit destination for anyone craving authentic Italian cuisine! With its cozy atmosphere, exceptional service, and delicious pizza and gelato, it's a 5-star experience that will keep you coming back for more.

Rating: 5/5 stars

Will we return? Absolutely! We're already looking forward to our next visit.

Highly recommended for:

- Italian food enthusiasts seeking authentic flavors
- Families and couples looking for a cozy and intimate dining experience
- Gelato lovers (you won't be disappointed!)
- Anyone seeking exceptional service and a warm, welcoming atmosphere!

Ok, the first time here.

Ordered a couple of slices of the pizzas that had on display.

I personally was not impressed on the flavoring.  Seemed a little bland to me.  now,  is my taste bud the same as yours, maybe not so, try it on your own.  Just my opinion.

The staff was very nice so, I like that for sure.

The place has a chill atmosphere but, it was also just after lunch time and empty.

I didn't try the Gelato but, might have to go back for that, just not the pizza.

Weather is great for their outdoor seating right now.

Our server, Brad, was awesome. He was attentive and friendly, while also being unobtrusive. Only the most skilled servers can do that. He even went far above and beyond to deliver my credit card to me when I left it behind at the table, even though I had already left the restaurant. He had heard us discussing going to the theater across the lot, and he hot-footed it all the way over there to find me. My hero! All that, plus the pie he recommended was incredible and the gelato was out of this world!

editorial_summary.overview: Relaxed, family-owned joint serving wood-fired pies with creative toppings plus gelato & beer.

recentReviews.text: Great place, very good pizza. We had the 18‚Äù Meatballs pizza. As you can see, it‚Äôs absolutely gigantic. We couldn‚Äôt finish it ü´Éüèª

Great place for really good East Coast style pizza. Always quick with food service and everything is delicious. I would recommend to anyone for a quick bite and never a wait to be seated. Always a very friendly staff.
Speedy service! Our waiter was attentive and kind. The food was excellent, I‚Äôm from the east coast and it really reminded me of home!
Che dire, da Italiano, ottima pizza. Margherita, ma veramente ben fatta. Complimenti.
This place has great entrees , pizza, and service. It's not just the Pie... even the garlic knots are awesome. Try this spot out.

Our server, Brad, was awesome. He was attentive and friendly, while also being unobtrusive. Only the most skilled servers can do that. He even went far above and beyond to deliver my credit card to me when I left it behind at the table, even though I had already left the restaurant. He had heard us discussing going to the theater across the lot, and he hot-footed it all the way over there to find me. My hero! All that, plus the pie he recommended was incredible and the gelato was out of this world!

detailedReviews.author: SDHHK
detailedReviews.text: Great place, very good pizza. We had the 18‚Äù Meatballs pizza. As you can see, it‚Äôs absolutely gigantic. We couldn‚Äôt finish it ü´Éüèª

detailedReviews.author: Mark Bragen
detailedReviews.text: Great place for really good East Coast style pizza. Always quick with food service and everything is delicious. I would recommend to anyone for a quick bite and never a wait to be seated. Always a very friendly staff.

detailedReviews.author: kenzie blankenship
detailedReviews.text: Speedy service! Our waiter was attentive and kind. The food was excellent, I‚Äôm from the east coast and it really reminded me of home!

detailedReviews.author: Fabrizio Banfi
detailedReviews.text: Che dire, da Italiano, ottima pizza. Margherita, ma veramente ben fatta. Complimenti.

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Sepanek
detailedReviews.text: This place has great entrees , pizza, and service. It's not just the Pie... even the garlic knots are awesome. Try this spot out.

detailedReviews.author: Toby Block
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in central Scottsdale

detailedReviews.author: smrowe72
detailedReviews.text: Our server, Brad, was awesome. He was attentive and friendly, while also being unobtrusive. Only the most skilled servers can do that. He even went far above and beyond to deliver my credit card to me when I left it behind at the table, even though I had already left the restaurant. He had heard us discussing going to the theater across the lot, and he hot-footed it all the way over there to find me. My hero! All that, plus the pie he recommended was incredible and the gelato was out of this world!

detailedReviews.author: whitney cody
detailedReviews.text: Great food! The chicken piccata and Lupara pasta are must haves!

detailedReviews.author: Ben Miller
detailedReviews.text: Great food and super service from all of the staff

detailedReviews.author: Cynthia Korn
detailedReviews.text: Always friendly and really good pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Arcot Premkumar
detailedReviews.text: Great family pizzeria! Always get good service and excellent food!

detailedReviews.author: G Komer
detailedReviews.text: My favorite place to get pasta and pizza! My favorite pizza are the bianco and veggie. My husband loves their chicken Marsala! I love their vodka pasta add shrimp! And my son loves their pasta w meatball. Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Robert Judd
detailedReviews.text: Delicious fast and excellent service will definitely be back. Been back alot of times since first revie best vodka pasta anywhere hands down!

detailedReviews.author: Angela Bryk
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, salads and gelato.  Favorite neighborhood spot!

detailedReviews.author: Kelli Finical
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is always a family favorite, and we cannot leave without some kind of pasta. The lupara is one of our favorites!

detailedReviews.author: Erika Leigh
detailedReviews.text: Service and food is always great!

detailedReviews.author: Kayla Washburn
detailedReviews.text: Kinda loud but the food was amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Sharon H.
detailedReviews.text: My family can't wait to eat this true NY style pizza. Crust is authentic. So good. Located in Westgate steps away from Dave and Busters.

detailedReviews.author: Jay Northrup
detailedReviews.text:
Fairly friendly service.  The 18" pizza was sufficient for the 3 of us.
The crust was ok; the sauce was decent; the toppings were scant.

detailedReviews.author: G E
detailedReviews.text:
They have great pizza slice lunch specials on weekdays - they should run those specials every day.
Also great home made gelato from a relatives shop in Mesa.
Patio is nice when the weather is good.  Inside is a little too dark and gloomy.
Food is great overall though. Lots of take out as well.

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Butcher
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely no complaints across the table!! Everything was incredible and so much bang for your buck! Diangelo the waiter/bartender/host was an absolute rockstar and was a lot of fun and a joy to meet. The food was fantastic and banger portions! I got the Calzone with Mixed Greens Salad (I managed 1/4 of the Calzone and am thrilled to have left overs!), my 13y/o got the Cauliflower Crust Pizza with Bacon/Pepperoni/Chicken (as a GF teen he has a hard time finding good food sometimes but he loved this pizza and was thrilled he had choices!). My husband got the Fig and Prosciutto Pizza ("it was great, fantastic, amazing"), and my 10y/o got the kids Spaghetti with Meatball (ate the whole thing and wanted seconds!) Would absolutely go back!

detailedReviews.author: Aaron B (Foodie Dad)
detailedReviews.text: Excellent little pizza place. Really cool authentic vibe inside. Prices are very reasonable and servings are substantial. The food was all excellent. Pizza was cooked perfect and very flavorful. Calzone was huge, soft, and delicious. The Arancini was so good and like nothing I‚Äôve had. The wine was fantastic and half off on Wednesday for the bottle. Our waiter Deangelo was the only server and bartender for the whole place and he did great. He was attentive, friendly, and very informative. I can‚Äôt wait to eat here again and try some of the other things on the menu.

detailedReviews.author: Perry Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text:
The calzone was amazing! The salad that came with it was so good with the basil vinaigrette.
Our server was attentive and friendly.
The Belgian Chocolate gelato was rich and tasty.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Dopuch
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm a pizza guy, and Il Capo has great pizza! Not many places can make a good Hawaiian, but Il Capo is not many places. Great!

detailedReviews.author: M S
detailedReviews.text: Nice happy hour

detailedReviews.author: Marlene Moore
detailedReviews.text: We were in a large group and the server was out of his depth. Asked multiple times to get water and drinks. Someone came by and we asked him but he said wasn‚Äôt our server. Went up to the bar as no one brought the drinks we had ordered and his response was he would tell our server, he didn‚Äôt. Finally got to order our food and I asked again for my drink, still did not get it until someone else went and called him back. Food was good in the end but trying to get a drink was near impossible.

detailedReviews.author: Patrick LaVoie
detailedReviews.text: Always a great environment and incredible food. Highly recommended

detailedReviews.author: Laura Tarin
detailedReviews.text: We eat here at least once a week, love the pizza. They make the best crust !!!

detailedReviews.author: Relaxing AZ
detailedReviews.text: One Bite! Dave Portnoy would love this spot as much as me & thanks Carlos & Brad for the amazing service!

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Piccininni
detailedReviews.text: Lovely lovely, local Italian restaurant and a busy nice plaza with the theater. Delicious food, reasonable prices. Some things are a bit overpriced I think but overall for a local establishment that provide some coupons every now and then I think it‚Äôs bravo.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Moran
detailedReviews.text:
As far as my wife and I are concerned, this is the best pizza restaurant in Maricopa county.
The associates are wonderful with High customer service.
We feel like we have gone to family when we walk away.

detailedReviews.author: Blake Flota
detailedReviews.text: Phenomenal food and service, we will be back

detailedReviews.author: Kurt Shimala
detailedReviews.text: Stopped here for a late pizza after driving back from Sedona for the day. It has a nice patio out front where we sat.  The pizzas were great, and the service was quick. I don‚Äôt recall it being too expensive either.

detailedReviews.author: Jeanne Sander
detailedReviews.text: Love their sausage and pepperoni pizza!! Great crust! And great sauce‚Ä¶ and attentive waiters‚Ä¶ our favorite

detailedReviews.author: Leidy Pineda
detailedReviews.text: One of the best pizzas I've ever had. My husband had the Bianco and I had the Hawaiian. Truly delicious! I would highly recommend this place. Our server, Dylan was so pleasant to talk to and the service was excellent. This is my new favorite pizza place ever.

detailedReviews.author: Brooke Vining
detailedReviews.text: This is place is a hidden gem. I can‚Äôt say enough about it. If you‚Äôre reading reviews and debating on whether to go here, GO! We were looking for a place with great pizza and this place was so much more‚Ä¶the pizza was fantastic, the pasta (we ordered the orecchiette and rigatoni)  was homemade, full of flavor and just so good. And, the  service was great; so friendly and they truly care about their customers. It was a great experience all  around. We will definitely be back

detailedReviews.author: Danielle Fecteau
detailedReviews.text: We held an event here and James was wonderful! Michael was our server multiple times and he is also great! Overall great experience and great food!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Wall
detailedReviews.text: I love this place reminds me about back home in Brooklyn New York

detailedReviews.author: Nazila MD
detailedReviews.text: Pretty good for quality and prices. Definitely not a fancy place but the waitress was really kind. My wine pour was a bit stingy and definitely not a place for mixed drinks. My sister and I each got the caprese salad and I do think it was WAY too much cheese and olives for one person. We could have shared it easily, so in that sense I wasn't as happy with my salad since it got monotonous. But the mozzarella was a LOT tastier and fresher than most mozzarellas I've had outside of Napoli (and I lived in Napoli 4 years where mozzarella di bufala is from so I can be picky). I didn't try the diavola pizza but my fam liked it a lot. One of us got the chicken picata and he said the chicken wasn't great, but the pasta was good. Overall good experience for the price and to have relaxed non-fancy Italian food.

detailedReviews.author: Christian Jerman
detailedReviews.text: Honestly still the best pizza I‚Äôve had in 3 years. My wife and I are always happy with the food and the happy hour prices. Nice cozy outdoor food court. So consistent with food quality and flavor.

detailedReviews.author: Shaan Patel
detailedReviews.text: This place was horrible. It took an hour to deliver our food. I will never recommend this place to anybody ever again. The owner was very rude to us as well. Never come here!

detailedReviews.author: Courtney Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Thoroughly satisfied with my pizza slices (meat lovers) and Poached Pear salad. It was a nice dinner surprise after discovering this establishment after work.

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Nutz
detailedReviews.text: I grew up with an Argentinean family making Gnocchi from scratch!!! Their Gnocchi was out of this world ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Kent Miller
detailedReviews.text: Quick takeout pizza recommendation by a friend. Pizza was very good and served quick and hot

detailedReviews.author: Matt C
detailedReviews.text:
5-Star Review: A Slice of Italy at Il Capo Pizzeria!

I'm thrilled to share my exceptional experience at Il Cappo, our go-to spot for delicious Italian cuisine!

Standout Features:

1. Cozy and Inviting Atmosphere: Il Cappo's comfortable and intimate setting makes it the perfect spot for a relaxing dinner or a quick gelato treat.

2. Exceptional Service: The staff at Il Cappo are warm, friendly, and attentive, always ensuring that our dining experience is top-notch.

3. Authentic Italian Flavors: Il Cappo's pizza and gelato are simply delicious.

Personal Experience:

We're regulars at Il Cappo, and for good reason! Whether we're in the mood for a delicious pizza or just a sweet gelato treat, Il Cappo never disappoints. The staff knows us by name, and we love the warm, welcoming atmosphere they create.

Verdict:

Il Cappo is a must-visit destination for anyone craving authentic Italian cuisine! With its cozy atmosphere, exceptional service, and delicious pizza and gelato, it's a 5-star experience that will keep you coming back for more.

Rating: 5/5 stars

Will we return? Absolutely! We're already looking forward to our next visit.

Highly recommended for:

- Italian food enthusiasts seeking authentic flavors
- Families and couples looking for a cozy and intimate dining experience
- Gelato lovers (you won't be disappointed!)
- Anyone seeking exceptional service and a warm, welcoming atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Dee ann
detailedReviews.text: Started with garlic knots, ribs for appetizers and finished with fig pizza and fungi pizza. It was delicious! I highly recommend visiting this pizzeria

detailedReviews.author: Kiley Palombella
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve always enjoyed Il Capo, the food is delicious, generous portions and we have always experienced good service.

detailedReviews.author: Cammy Cavan
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza ever, and their Cauliflower crust is fabulous!

detailedReviews.author: Pam Van Cleave
detailedReviews.text: Great food and wonderful friendly service. The beet and arugula salad is the best in Scottsdale!  Love the meatball appetizer. The tiramisu is delicious, one is plenty for 2 people. Had the calamari platter today, very tasty!

detailedReviews.author: Laura Jorden
detailedReviews.text: Great neighborhood place!  Pizza is wonderful and their balsamic reduction Beet Salad is one of my favorites!  As a local realtor I love having a place like this within walking distance to my home!

detailedReviews.author: Orlando R
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is great! Big slices and delicious!  I like them well done then it‚Äôs perfect for me.

detailedReviews.author: larry iken
detailedReviews.text:
Great food
Excellent service

detailedReviews.author: laura jorden
detailedReviews.text: As a local realtor, I love to take clients to neighborhood spots.  Their beet and balsamic salad is fantastic.  We often walk to dinner and eat on their patio!

detailedReviews.author: Carole Burton
detailedReviews.text: Really great pizza nice atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Soro Salerno
detailedReviews.text: I was disappointed with their arrancini. But I really enjoyed the pizza and I loved the gelato case with all the different variety. They also have a large patio which is nice to enjoy the weather.

detailedReviews.author: Chris Abernathy
detailedReviews.text: Great Pizza and Happy hour.....the Happy hour prices are awesome.

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Evarts
detailedReviews.text: Honestly the best pizza place in Scottsdale. Bianco pizza is like a triumph of the human spirit.

detailedReviews.author: Rodger
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm new to AZ from PA and looking for all kinds of restaurants. We received a flyer in the mail and decided to check it out. There always a $10 coupon for orders over $30 so it seemed well worth the risk. I arrived to possibly the manager greeting me and directed me to pick up area. The order wasn‚Äôt quite ready, but once it was, they brought to me. Great service, great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Laarnie Ventura
detailedReviews.text: I had such an amazing time at Il Capo! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere felt warm and welcoming. The staff was incredibly friendly and made sure we felt comfortable throughout the entire meal. The food was absolutely delicious . You can really tell they use fresh, high-quality ingredients.The service was quick and attentive. I left feeling happy and satisfied. I can‚Äôt wait to go back and would recommend Il Capo to anyone looking for a great meal in a lovely setting!

detailedReviews.author: Kali Albright
detailedReviews.text: I will never get sick of this place! Amazing & flavorful food and very friendly staff. My go to is their grandma‚Äôs pizza. I need their pizza at least once a month!

detailedReviews.author: Miguel S.
detailedReviews.text: Order the pizza to go but they were great. Ready in about 25-30 minutes for two large pizzas.

detailedReviews.author: Dr. Ron Widen
detailedReviews.text: Great meatballs, pizza and gelato. Quick and friendly service.

detailedReviews.author: C Pa
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza place in the valley. Hot honey pepperoni pizza, cheese pizza, fig prosciutto, you can‚Äôt go wrong with any of them

detailedReviews.author: Joel Kaplan
detailedReviews.text: We didn‚Äôt care for the pizza. Way to doughie. The pear salad was yummy. Service was very good. We loved the patio on a nice Scottsdale night.

detailedReviews.author: Albert Belsky
detailedReviews.text: Waiter was very knowledgeable and helpful with menu BUT BOTH salads and entrees came out at the same time. I commented to the waiter and he said that each one comes from a separate part of the kitchen and there is no control over that. I did not eat my salad because my entree was in front of me. I should have sent my salad back, that was my fault BUT I will not go back.

detailedReviews.author: Trace Moran
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food and drinks.  All served with a smile.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Quinn (dmqdagreat)
detailedReviews.text:
I love this pizzeria! The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, with friendly staff who make you feel welcomed. But the real star of the show is the pizza itself - the crust is perfectly crispy, the sauce is rich and tangy, and the cheese is melted to perfection.

I've tried several different pies, but the Boss is my absolute favorite.

Prices are super reasonable, especially considering the generous portion sizes. I've never left here feeling hungry or ripped off.

Overall, I'm so impressed with this pizzeria. It's quickly become my go-to spot for a delicious, satisfying meal. Don't miss out - give it a try and taste the difference for yourself!

detailedReviews.author: Tiffany Thompson
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic, authentic, high quality ingredients!! We had soup, one of their insane salads, and pizza, so we got a great taste of multiple items. Definitely recommend El Capo, and we will surely be back the next time we are in Scottsdale!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Wayant
detailedReviews.text: Just ordered for delivery and had complications with online ordering, called the restaurant and everything was handled with fast and perfection customer service without any questions just right to the point. It‚Äôs very frustrating and complicated these days to get such professionalism. Thank you

detailedReviews.author: Benjamin Sucher
detailedReviews.text: Awesome place, can't wait to return!

detailedReviews.author: M R
detailedReviews.text: Ok I went to Bianco's,Pizzacatas,Yo Paulys and Pomos to see who had the best New York Pizza. I give the award to Il Capo Pizzeria

detailedReviews.author: Tanja
detailedReviews.text: I haven‚Äôt dined in but delivery/pick up has been great. I always get the margherita pizza adding pepperoni and mushrooms :) and out of all pizza I‚Äôve had in Phoenix and most places it‚Äôs the most flavorful. Definitely recommend

detailedReviews.author: Antonia Rice
detailedReviews.text: Great Atmosphere  üòÅ  music is always on the spot, especially Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Fridays (I think it's that bartender; ) lol) hand-made pastas with the boss sauce! So yummy - and let's not forget those guys  tossing that dough high in the air so masterfully ' pizza pies come steaming out of the oven crisp to perfection üëå with my favorite wine wine wine, I love it ...‚Ä¶mostly on Wednesday üç∑ üç∑ for üç∑ can't go wrong üëç üëç

detailedReviews.author: Connie Bigelow
detailedReviews.text: One of our regular eateries. Great service, atmosphere and food. I would highly recommend!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the attentive and friendly service, with staff going above and beyond, such as returning a forgotten credit card. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant is known for its delicious East Coast style pizza and a variety of other Italian dishes that remind customers of home. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
Speedy service and no wait times make it a great spot for a quick bite without sacrificing quality. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times for food and drinks - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues due to poor service and rude interactions - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
